author: RTÉ News
title: Goats invade streets of Welsh coastal resort
description: A herd of Kashmiri goats have invaded a Welsh seaside resort after coronavirus restrictions left the streets deserted.
content:
A herd of Kashmiri goats have invaded a Welsh seaside resort after coronavirus restrictions left the streets deserted.
The animals, who normally roam free on a nearby headland jutting out into the Irish Sea, have instead wandered into Llandudno where they ha… [+1870 chars]
